CustomField.description: This is the bank that will be receiving the documents required in Letter of Credit. The receiving or accepting bank could either be the: 1) Issuing Bank; 2) Confirming Bank; or 3) Advising Bank, defined under the Letter of Credit Agreement.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the bank that will be receiving the documents required in Letter of Credit. The receiving or accepting bank could either be the: 1) Issuing Bank; 2) Confirming Bank; or 3) Advising Bank, defined under the Letter of Credit Agreement.
CustomField.label: Letter of Credit Receiving Bank
